0.5.name: wordpress/php-image-editor-lite
0.5.description:
Alternative image editing directly in WordPress. Replaces the original image editor.

Features:

  • Resize (drag and drop)
  • Rotate
  • Crop (drag and drop)
  • Brightness
  • Contrast
  • Undo
  • Grayscale
  • Easy user interface

Checkout the live demo.

Note: If you're interested in the lite version, you may also like the pro version.
